Analysis module¶

Analyse class¶

class src.analysis.analyse.Analyse(start_date, end_date, freq, dataset_path)¶

The Analyse class process .csv files inclued into dataset_path and process it.

Parameters

  • start_date (str) – The starting date of the analyse, all data before this date is ignored. The format must be : ‘YYYY-MM’ or only ‘YYYY’.

  • end_date (str) – The ending date of the analyse, all data after this date is ignored. The format must be : ‘YYYY-MM’ or only ‘YYYY’.

  • freq (str) – The frequency of result output. Authorized value : ‘M’ for a monthly frequency or ‘Y’ for an annual frequency.

  • dataset_path (str) – The input folder path containing all .csv files.

E_DATE¶

Ending date.

S_DATE¶

Starting date.

cleaning_period(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, col_name) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Remove data which is not in the interval

dataset_clean¶

Clean pandas.DataFrame dataset (in the current period).

dataset_raw¶

Raw pandas.DataFrame dataset.

Minimization function¶

src.analysis.minimization.minimization(analyse)¶

Finds the best parameters and returns the metrics for the fit of a logistical function.

Parameters

analyse (analyse.Analyse) – instance of the analyse.Analyse realated to a crtc.

Stats functions¶

src.analysis.stats.get_basic_stats(serie)¶

Compute basic stats: mean, median, std, skewness, kurtosis.

Parameters

serie (pandas.Serie) – input serie to compute.

src.analysis.stats.metrics_into_csv(analysis_list, float_nb, output_path)¶

Save metrics of all crtc into a csv file.

Parameters

  • analysis_list ([analyse.Analyse]) – list of analyse.Analyse instance.

  • float_nb (int) – number of decimal points.

  • output_path (pathlib.PurePath) – output path to the result folder.

src.analysis.stats.stats_into_csv(analysis_list, float_nb, output_path)¶

Compute basic stats all crtc.

Parameters

  • analysis_list ([analyse.Analyse]) – list of analyse.Analyse instance.

  • float_nb (int) – number of decimal points.

  • output_path (pathlib.PurePath) – output path to the result folder.
